channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General Ellison sues to stop illegal termination of federal electric vehicle infrastructure funding
item.description:
Publication Date: May 07, 2025

Joins coalition of 15 AGs in fighting Trump administration cuts to Congressionally approved funding; Minnesota stands to lose $50 million

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/05/07_NEVI.asp
